```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(googlesheets4)
```

```{r}
sheets_deauth()
election_data <- read_sheet("13NhlT-Oik5P4NOKRWwrJ7xZQlddFNk81HHEw9wkWglM")


group_by(gender)
ggplot(election_data, aes(x = dvote)) +
  geom_bar()

glm(formula = dvote ~ partisanship, data = election_data)


election_data %>% 
mutate(partisanship2 = if_else(partisanship))

ggplot(aes(x = partisanship, y = ))
```
